Prerequisites: SATISFACTORY COMPLETION OF ENC0020, REA0002, AND MAT0024, OR APPROPRIATE PLACEMENT SCORES.
Course Description: INTRODUCTORY COMPUTER ACCOUNTING COURSE. ACCOUNTING WITH QUICKBOOKS WILL BE EMPHASIZED. THE COMPUTER WILL BE USED FOR GENERAL LEDGER PROCEDURES, ACCOUNTS RECIEVEBLE, ACCOUNTS PAYABLE, INVENTORY, FIXED ASSETS, PAYROLL, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENT PREPERATION.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
